thread.section_title: StorageMart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of StorageMart | storage-mart.com | 2 of 211
thread.title: Sharise R.

author: Sharise R.
title: Sharise R.
text: I had a storage locker with them before which I got rid of once I no longer needed it. They were always helpful and friendly. I even had furniture delivered there that they received on my behalf because I couldn't make it there in time. Got a locker this time for my mother, one phone call and they had exactly what I needed in her price range. I would recommend this company to everyone. Not to mention, its super clean and not creepy at all.
